attributes.title: This all crashed my phone
attributes.review: It took me a few hours to download his app but after it finished my phone stopped working and turned off. Turns out this app gave my phone a clown virus 🤡🦠 0/10 worst app ever, would never recommend

attributes.title: Yea ummmm
attributes.review: Yeah sooooo it took almost a week to download. ( I only got it because RIP Donald) then when I opened it, it made my phone completely crash! I had to buy a new phone because of this app. Then people hacked me on my new phone from this app. So disgusting. Def a one star.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD🤢🤢🤢🤢🤢🤮🤮
attributes.review: this app is ridiculous I downloaded it to get news updates but instead it wouldn’t load it took 5 days to download which is ridiculous and when I finally did download it wouldn’t work which is RIDICULOUS AJD DOWNRIGHT NOT OK your trying to take tiktok off the app store TAKE THIS OFF FIRST🙄🙄🙄🙄

attributes.title: open at the never
attributes.review: When I was trying to get into the app it did not even open so that comunist person who created the app is causing me to loose 2 gigabytes each time I try to get in the app so that giant orange Cheeto puff obviously can’t pay attention.

attributes.title: do not download this app
attributes.review:
this was honestly a horrible mistake. i regret ever downloading this app. it constantly blows up my phone and it immediately asked for my
number and i start getting my number spammed by random numbers. i DO NOT recommend.

attributes.title: Laggy, do not recommend 🥳✨🧚‍♀️
attributes.review: I would just like to say... just like the president it’s so laggy and hardly works. 🤔 kinda strange to think he could have the best tech wizards making his app, but instead like everything else... he decides to go the cheap route

attributes.title: very bad app, don’t like it
attributes.review: it sends so many obnoxious notifications and right off the bat it asked me to enter my phone number! No option to say no, which is a huge privacy issue! This app also promotes hate speech, homophobia, racism, xenophobia, and white supremacy! Do not download!

attributes.title: Bad app
attributes.review: I downloaded this app and it gave my phone a virus it lags so much I just downloaded it yesterday and my phone is glitching it never had this problem before the app is laggy it takes forever to open up...

attributes.title: This app SUUCKS!
attributes.review: It took so long for this app to download, and it completely messed up my phone anytime the app was open. It made so many other apps glitch and shut down, and the things in this app are so ungodly disgusting and disturbing. This app is so dangerous and promotes the most inhuman ideologies.

attributes.title: EMBARRASSING ⚡️✨🌙
attributes.review: This app asked for my gender and the only options were male and female. I AM A VEGETABLE 🙄. That’s not the only problem it took 50 years to download and when it did my phone battery CAUGHT ON FIRE. The chances of me downloading this app again is slim to none🤗✨wouldn’t recommend it 0/10 🌙⭐️🤩
